q1: Is Spain a better side than Portugal?
a1: Spain has an easier task than Portugal.
q2: What was the score between Spain and Portugal?
a2: In the 2018 World Cup the score was Portugal 3-3 Spain.
a3: What made the game between Spain and Portugal so crazy? Ties are not unusual.
q4: It was a high scoring game, teams don't usually score 3 goals each
a4: Especially when it is a game between two strong teams.
q5: Spain did very good world but lacked technique to advance
a5: What do you think could be improved in their technique to improve?
